question:
With reference to EMISAT, consider the following statements:
  1. It carried 28 foreign satellites belonging to USA, Spain, Lithuania and Switzerland.
  2. It will be used to identify and detect enemy radars placed at the borderline.
  3. The launch vehicle used is PSLV â€“ C45.
Which of the above statements is / are correct?
explanation: ISRO launched EMISAT on April 1, 2019 along with 28 other foreign satellites from US, Switzerland, Lithuania and Spain. The launch vehicle used for this 436 kg satellite is PSLV- C45. This satellite has been placed at an orbit of 736 km. This low-Earth orbit satellite will monitor and give locations for enemy radar sites deep in their territory. India seeks to give birth to a new surveillance satellite. The 3 payloads deployed are Automatic Identification System from ISRO, Automatic Packet Repeating System from AMSAT, India and Advanced Retarding Potential Analyzer developed in the Indian Institute of Space Technology (IIST).
